poems.content:
Ek nazm likhne ke liye mujhe aurat chahiye.. ğŸ€
Hubahu us shakhs jaisi surat chahiye.. ğŸ«‚
Na koi shor ho, aur na koi dastak ho, ğŸŒ·
Uske saath khaali kamre mein fursat chahiye.. ğŸ‘€
Choodiyan to le aaya main uske khatir, ğŸŒ¹
Lekin uski kalai pakadne ke liye himmat chahiye.. ğŸ™ˆ
Uske badan ko poore tareeke se taraashne ke liye, ğŸŒ™
Mujhe uski razaamandi aur lehze mein nazakat chahiye.. ğŸ¥€

Uski narazgi ka mai kya karu??? ğŸ’­
Siwaay ehtraam ke mai kya karu?? ğŸŒ™
Mujhe to milna hai uss shaqs se, ğŸ©·
Woh mujhe dekhna nahi chahti toh mai kya karu?? ğŸ€
Usko chahiye mujhse mohabbat 'rohannnn', ğŸ¤ŒğŸ»
Lekin mujhko jism ki latt lag chuki hai toh mai kya karu?? ğŸ«€
Meri aarzo hai ki woh aa jaaye wapas mere paas, ğŸ‚
Lekin meri duaa qabool nahi hoti toh mai kya karu?? ğŸ§¿

Mohabbat kyaa hai? shayad "wo"..
Wo kyaa hai? mera khawab,
Khawab kya hai? tript hona,
Tript kya hai? meri mohabbat,
Mohabbat kyaa hai? shayad "wo"..ğŸ¥€

Wo kyaa hai? ik sukoon,
Sukoon kya hai? uski khamoshi,
Khamoshi kyaa hai? Bss ek ehsaas,
Ehsaas kya hai? usse mohabbat,
Mohabbat kyaa hai? shayad "wo"..ğŸ¤

Hosh aaya toh laga, main haqeeqat mein hoon ya kisi khwaab mein pahunh chuka hoon.
Use mandap mein le jaya ja raha hai, na jaane main kahaan pahunh chuka hoon.
Kisi anjaane ke haathon mein nariyal, aur uske kaampte hue haath,
Woh dulhan ke kapdon mein hai, shayad main uski shaadi tak pahunh chuka hoon.

Aansu bahte gaye, rasmein poori hoti rahi aur raat bhi dhalne lagi,
Yeh sab apni aankhon se dekhkar, main mafloozi mein pahunh chuka hoon.
Ab toh uske maathay mein sindoor aur kalai mein kangan hai "rohannnn",
Chaar saalon ke intezaar mein, main dard ki qabr tak pahunh chuka hoon.

Bulanaa mujhko mai aungaa jarrur teri sagaai mein..
Mere dil ka kya hai mai fek dunga usko khaai mein..
Ek toh mere imtehaan, upar se tera janamdin,
Kaatkar lagaa de khanjar tu meri kalaai mein..

Puchna usse kya tofa diya hai uske mehboob ne,
Koi toh bola bass thi ek raat tere raqeeb ke rajaai mein..
Tune kya December December lagaa rakha hai rohannn,
Bass tu padhta jaa duaa uski bhalaayi mein..

Mai aadhi raat ko pankhee ko dekhta rehta hoon...
Tu kyaa kr rhi hogi iss waqt bass yhi sochta rehta hoon...
Ab toh dhoop ki aas karenge log iss sard mausam mein,
Mai toh bagair kisi jism ko odhe sota rehta hoon...

Jaane de, usee jaane de apne zehan se "rohannn",
Ab toh tawaif ke saamne mai apni hawas naapta rehta hoon..
Tu itna bhi khwaar na ho ki log tere badan ko hi chahe,
Bass isi darr se mai tujhe harr galiyon mein dhoondhta rehta hoon...

Thakan jab jyada ho tumko to mere paas aakar, mere andar kho jaana..
Rote-rote jab haal kharab kar lo tum apna, mere shaane par aakar so jaana..

Isiliye shayad tune bataya hi nahii dukh apna,
Pareshaan ho jab bhi tum mere gale, lagkar tum ro jaana..

Tumhaare naam ke saare sabdh jod rakhe hai "rohannn",
Iss gazal ke sbhi phla akshar tere naam se juda hai,
Phir bhi naa maano toh kisi aur ke ho jaana..

Tumse ishq karna mera intikhaab to nahin.. ğŸ«€
Itna na padho mujhko main koi kitaab to nahin.. ğŸ‚
Shab-o-roz woh mere paas mere saamne baithi rehti hai, ğŸ¤²ğŸ»
Main to nafsiyati hoon, kahin "woh" khwaab to nahin.. ğŸ”ª

Uske surkh hothon ka nasha tujhko kaise lag gaya "rohannn", ğŸ¥€
Main to zehar pee raha tha koi sharaab to nahin.. ğŸ¥‚

Jismani sukoon ko woh hamnawa samajh baithi hai, use maara jaaye.
Kai paagalon ko ishq ne thikaane lagaye hai jo na laga use maara jaaye.

Suna hai usko shauk hai mehndi lagane ke,
Jiska naam hogi uski hatheli par, kaash woh maara jaaye.

Saji hogi woh dulhan bankar apne nikaah ke liye,
Bhari baraat mein uske hone wala shauhar maara jaaye.

Uska manpasandida rang sufaid hai,
Kyon na yeh uska mustaqbil banaya jaaye, kaash woh maara jaaye.

Nazmein-ghazlein likhne ke bahaane na jaane kitni badduaayein dedi tumne "rohannn"
Chhodo saari baaton ko usse pehle yeh nafsiyati-kamzarf maara jaaye..

Uski tasveer, tasveer nahi keemti amaanat hai, ğŸ¥€
Agar gir jaaye toh uske zulfen toh qayamat hai,

Apni saheliyon ke saamne usne daawa kiya ki "rohannnn" jismon ka shaukeen hai,
Aur hum hai ki sabko bata rakha hai ki woh humaari aakhri chahat hai. ğŸ«€

Usne apne nikaah ke liye bhi mere hi dushman ko chuna,
Humne bhi uske shaadi ka mahaul aisa banaya jaise koi iddat hai!!

Main uski aadatein apni aadaton mein daalna chahta hoon... ğŸ«¶ğŸ»
Usko darshan pasand hai to main bas usko sunna chahta hoon... ğŸ§¸

Kisi din woh mile aur mere paas baithe to bolun usse, ğŸ«€
Khwaabon mein nahin haqeeqat mein bhi tumse hi nikaah karna chahta hoon... ğŸ’

Mere ikhtiyaar mein nahin tumhe bhool paana "rohannnn", ğŸ¤
Woh kisi ki utaran ho to bhi usi ko pehnna chahta hoon... ğŸ¥€

Uski dhundhli yaadein yahi kahi padi hai kisi kone mein... ğŸ’­
Kya-kya dastavej lagte hai kisi ka hone mein.. ğŸ‘€

Tum kya jaano "rohannn" ye ehd-e-wafa kya hota hai, ğŸ¥€
Bahut farq hai mohabbat aur tawaif ke saamne rone mein... ğŸ«€

Jyada se jyada tera nikaah hoga kisi aur se, ğŸ’
Lekin tum toh maahir ho gairo ke saath hum-bistar hone mein.. ğŸ–¤

Agar wo kitaabo se gazle padhne lagi, toh tera kya hoga..
Husn ke naam par mohabbat karne lagi, toh tera kya hoga..

Uska naam kisi ne zameen par likha tha aur wo banjar ho gayi,
Socho agar wo "rohannn" ke zehan mein basne lagi, toh tera kya hoga...

Matt kar gairo ke saamne uski tarafdaari,
Tere alawa agar wo kisi aur ki bahon mein sone lagi, toh tera kya hoga...

Suna hai uska janamdin December-e-23 ko aata hai..
Uska aashiq usko surkh-e-Gulaab dekar manaata hai..

Humare toh abhi zakhm-e-tamanna bhi khatam nahi hui,
Usko dekho mere saamne hi apne mehboob ko sajaata hai..

Fakir ban kar mazaaron mein bhatakta rehta hoon "rohann",
Mandiron-masjidon mein sirf usi ke dua ke liye apne haath uthaata hai..

Mubarak baad dene ke liye koi zariya hi nahi bacha,
Maikhane mein jaakar ab wo apni yadon ko bhulaata hai..

Ee se ibaadadat karta hoon main tumhari.
Ee se izzat-e-hifazat karta hoon main tumhari.
Ee se ishq karta hai rohannn tumse,
Ee se intezaar abhi bhi karta hoon main tumhari...

Maa se mashroof ho gaya hoon main phir bhi,
Maa se minnatein khuda se karta hoon main tumhari..
Maa se mehboob bana liya hai tumne, tumhe bhoolkar,
Maa se mushkilen kam karta hoon main tumhari..!

Khuda aaj meharbaan hai bola tere liye main kya kar sakoon...
Muskurate hua manga maine apne mehboob ke saamne marr sakoon..

Saza-e-mohabbat karte karte saza-e-maut ki qafan ban gayi,
Suna hai kya "rohannn" tumne aaj wo kisi aur ki dulhan ban gayi....

Main apni gairat ke wajah se qurbaan ho gaya,
Chhodo saari baaton ko ab se wo mere liye anjaan ho gaya..

Pehli mohabbat ko bhulne ke liye humne dusri mohabbat ki..
Jisne hume thukraya tha humne usi ki izzat ki..
Khuda ka khel dekho yaaro bada hi karishmaye hai
Dusri mohabbat bhi usi se hui jisse humne pehli mohabbat ki..

Sab ke sab yaha apni mohabbat ka rona karte hai
Humne yaaro uske yaado ke saath ulfat ki.. (ulfat = dosti..)
Wo na jaane aaj kal kiske saath rehta hai
Maine unke diye gaye haseen pal ke saath kurbat ki.. (Kurbat = Nazdiki)

Maine usko apne dil-o-jaan se lagaya tha
Yaar usne kisi aur ka naam lekar humpar ye tohmat ki.. (Tohmat = jhota aarop)
Chalo ab jo hua so hua ab jaane do
Uske diye gaye gamo ke saath se maine rukhsat ki.. (Rukshat = vida Lena)

Ye December ka mahina aur sard rate kuch kuch yaad aa raha hai..
Mai kaise bhul sakta hu ki tumhara janamdin aa raha hai..
Pechle baras jo harkate ki thi maine badi hi behudgi thi
Bass yahi baat mujhko andar se khaya jaa raha hai..

Sochta hu ki tumhe janamdin ki Mubarakbaad de hi du
Par kya karu tumhara phone number vyast bataya jaa raha hai..
Ye shaayari maine bass tumhare liye likhi hai
Kaash koi tumhe bataa de ki tera Aashiq shaayar banta jaa raha hai..

Chalo chhodo saari puraani baato ko
Bass kuch hi din baad naaya saal aa raha hai..
Jab tune diya tha pehli baar apna phone number
Dekho to yaar wo January bhi aa raha hai, wo January bhi aa raha..

Humare saare khwab kabhi haqeeqat nahi hoti..
Har kisi shaks se hume mohabbat nahi hoti..
Mano ya na mano ye ishq ki sachchai hai
Jisse hume sachi mohabbat ho jaye hume usi ki zaroorat nahi hoti.

Jo galti tumse hui hai tumhe usko bhulana hai
Jisko tumne apni duniya mani hai aksar wahi qayanaat nahi hoti.. (Qayanaat = universe)
Uski yaade aur uski tasveero ko tumhe apne dil se nikalna hai
Jo tumhare pyaar ko samajh nahi sakte usko tumhari Inayat nahi hoti.. (Inayat = care)

Jo koi bhi tumhe chaahne ka dhong karte hai
Usko tumse mohabbat kabhi bhi roohaniyat nahi hoti..

Pehli mohabbat ke baad ye nasha dubara na karna
Uski yaadon ko apne zehan se juda na karna.. ğŸ’­
Kya pata kis mod par kisi raah par wo nazar aa jaye
Uske naye Aashiq ko dekhar apna mizaaj kharab na karna.. ğŸ˜ª

Bahut dino baad wo tumhe nazar aayi hai
Uska haal puchna uss par apna haq ada na karna.. ğŸ¥€
Agar wo kahe ki tumhare bina khush hai
Yaar uski baato par muskara dena magar yakeen na karna.. ğŸ˜Œ

Jaate jaate tumhe unko ek mashwara dena hai
Mohabbat karo kisi se magar aitbaar kise par na karna.. â˜®ï¸

Tut gaya wo ladka kisi ko chahatein hue..
Wo khud ko bhul gaya kisi ko manate hue..
Pata nahi wo din kab aayega jab log kahenge
Marr gaya wo ladka har kisi ko haasate hue..

Bikhri hue cheze aasani se kabhi judti nahi
Khush hoya nahi jata kisi ko rulate hue..
Tanhaiyon se kabhi mukammal duniya banti nahi
Aankho se aasu aa gaye ye baat kisi ko samjhate hue..

Wo humare lafzo ko apne dil se sunti nahi
Hum begairat ho gaye ye kahaani kisi ko sunate hue..
Humara dil tuta hai magar wo manti nahi
Hum bhi usko bhula denge kisi tasveer ko jalate hue..

Kyu hakimo se mulakat karke aaya hu aaj fir se..
Kyu uski yaadein mujhko satane lagi hai aaj fir se...
Mai to bhul chuka tha uss purane ishq ko
Kyu achanak uske liye mohabbat jagi iss dil mein aaj fir se..

Wo to chali gayi thi chhodkar tere is tanha dil ko
Kyu roya tu uss bewafa ke liye aaj fir se..
Tuta hua kaanch kabhi judta nahi
Kyu ye dil wapas jaa raha hai unhe raaho par aaj fir se..

Maana wo hume pasand nahi karti
Kyu ye baat samajh nahi aa rahi mujhko aaj fir se..
Na jaane kyu maikhane mein uska naam liya
Kyu bina peeye chadne lagi hai aaj fir se..

Pehle jaisa hi wo shaks mujhe pasand aane laga hai
Kyu ye mann kar raha kar du izhaar usse aaj fir se..

Udaasiio ne mere dil-o-dimag ko ghera hai..
Wo shakhs jise tum apna batate ho asal mein mera hai..
Karni thi tumse kuch guftagu ek baar wapas to aao
Jiske saath tum rehte ho wo to seher ka lutera hai..

Kyu deti ho itna dhyaan puraani baato ko
Kher sab kuch chhodo aaj ek naya sawera hai...
Aaj kal kuch aacha nahi lagta inh sard raato mein
Jabse tumne humse apni nazro ko fera hai..

Mohabbat mein aksar sab kuch ek tarfa nahi hota
Yaar mera ye na samajh dil bhi to tera hai...
Kuch bacha nahi tere jaane ke baad iss dil mein
Bass charo taraf chhaya ek andhera hai..

Jab jab tumhe bhulne ki koshish karta hai ye dil
Tab tab maine tere yaado ko har taraf bikhera hai...

Apni jindagi ek ladki ke peeche barbaad na kar..
Use apne khayalon mein rakhkar usko aabad na kar..
Meri baat maan tu apne ghar ka eklota ladka hai
Aise shaks ke liye khuda se fariyaad na kar..

Mana ki wo tere iss nadan dil mein rehti hai
Yaar uss fareeb-e-mohabbat ko itna bhi yaad na kar...
Kayi zurm kiye hai usne tumahari mohabbat par
Uske diye gaye gamo ko apne-aap se azaad na kar..

Uski de gayi masoomiyat mere paas abhi bhi majood hai
Ae mere dost tu samajh uski yaado ko itna parizaad na kar.. (Parizaad = khubsurat)

Mohabbat ke naam par ek gazal likhta hu..
Teri yaado mein mai dar-badar bhatakta hu..
Ek shaam tu mujhe iss qadar yaad aaya
Lo aaj mei apne iss dil ka haal rakhta hu..

Mai apne in jaazbaato ko rok na paaya
Chalo fir se apne aankho ko teri yaado mein rulata hu..
Tu mere zehan mein kuch iss tarah hai samaya
Jaise mai shaayario ke liye apni neendon ko bhagata hu..

Kisi anjaane ke khatir tune mujhko itna hai tadapaya
Ye ishq ki kahaani mai tute hue logo ko sunata hu..
Na puchna mujhse ki ek tarfa mein maine kya kya hai paaya
Yaar mai aaj bhi tumhe khuda ki tarah manta hu..

Uski gali mein aaj dubara gaya tha ye dil..
Bike par baithe baithe achanak rone lag gaya tha ye dil..
Wo itni bhi khaas nahi jitna tune socha hai
Uski yaad aati hi na jaane kyu pagla gaya tha ye dil..

Kuch zakhm purane kar liye the maine
Naa jaane kyu uske ikhtiyaar mein fass gaya tha ye dil..
Kayi baar socha laga lu ye dil kisi aur se
Pata nahi kyu tumhare rehne ka afsos kar ne lag gaya tha ye dil..

Hum apni mohabbat ko badnam nahi karte...
Hum shayar hai janab aisa ginhona kaam nahi karte.
Aur jise hum ne chaahe agar usne hume na chaaha...
To dubara unko hum pareshaan nahi karte..

Hum uski mohabbat mein beintehaa tadapaye gaye hai
Uske tasveer ke alawa kisi aur ka dedaar nahi karte..
Jo log humari tarah ishq mein rulaye gaye hai
Yaar humare jaise jismo ka vyaapar nahi karte..

Jo samajhna hai tumhe tum wo samajh lo
Abse hum apni mohabbat ka izhaar nahi karte...
Bhula diya hai tumko iss dil ne
Jao jao kisi aur ke paas abse tumhari hum talabgaar nahi karte..

Humne bhi kisi ko shiddat se chaha tha Miya pehle, bahut pehle...
Hume bhi hue thi kisi se mohabbat miya pehle, bahut pehle..
Khuda jaane wo konsi manhuss ghadi thi yaaro
Warna kabhi unki bhi jaan basti thi humpe miya pehle, bahut pehle...

Usko jaana tha isiliye wo jaa chuki thi
Ye bhanak humko pehli hi lag gayi thi miya pehle, bahut pehle..
Khudkhushi hi jawab nahi jindagi jeene ka
Kabhi uske saath bhi humne sapne sajaye the miya pehle, bahut pehle..

Kuch pal hai tere saath jo hum kabhi na bhul payenge
Ye dil bhi tumhare hawale kar diya tha humne Miya pehle, bahut pehle..
Uske jaane se zindagi mein andhera chaa gaya tha
Kabhi ye dil bahut khush hoya karta tha Miya pehle, bahut pehle.

Apni zindagi ko azaab kaise banate hai koi humse puche..
Kisi ki yaado ko kaise sajate hai koi humse puche..
Khudgarzi toh ye dimag karta hai dil ke bass mein kaha
Wo to kisi aur ka hai ye khud ko kaise samjhate hai koi humse puche..

Ho sake to apne dilo ki narazagi dur kar dena ae dost
Khudki banayi gayi qayanaat ko kaise bhulate hai koi humse puche.
Teri yaado ka mere paas ab koi kaam nahi
Khud se hi khud ko fareebi kaise bulate hai koi humse puche..

Tere chehre ki noor ki mujhe abhi zarurat hai
Apni sher-o-shayari mein tera naam lekar isko kaise taraaste hai koi humse puche....

Kabhi kabhi hum khud se ek savaal karte hai..
Kya wo humari tarah humara bhi khayaal karte hai..
Ye dil tut kar kehne laga mujhse ae faramosh sambhal ja tu
Wo shaks to kisi aur ke haalo ko behaal karte hai..

Tu rota reh, uski yaado mein khota reh, usko koi farak nahi padta
Kyu apne zakhmo ko kuraid kar aap ye kamaal karte hai..
Ab bahut hua, kuch naya kar, uske baare mat soch
Na jaane kyu uske yado mein apne aankho se nihaal karte hai.. (Nihaal = Barsat..)

Mohabbat, Ashiqui aur ye ishq ye sab barbaadi ke fasane hai
Ye sab pata hone ke baad bhi log isi ka malaal karte hai..
Ishq ne pehle hi kaha sab se mera rang fika nahi
Fir bhi hum jaise apni rooh-o-jaan ko peesakar isko gulaal karte hai..

Mai mohabbat ki taalime pure karke aaya hu..
Uske hath ki bani chai pee kar aaya hu..
Ab batao kis kis ke dilo ko todna hai
Mai mohabbat ke jazbato ko peeche chod kar aaya hu..

Matt ghabrana tum apne iss aashiq se
Mai apni saari sharafat samet kar aaya hu..
Chaand ka bhi koi wajood nahi aasman ke bina
Mai tumhare ishq ke liye apna daam sasta karke aaya hu..

Tum hooba hu paaro ki tarah lagte ho
Dekho mai bhi tumhare liye devdaas ban kar aaya hu..
Unki bhi mohabbat reh gayi thi adhuri
Lo main bhi apni tamam zindagi tere naam kar ke aaya hu...

Tum uski husn ki baate karte ho hume to uska naam bhi pyaara lagta hai..
Kisi aur ki taraf wo nazar uthaye to humko ye bhi gawaara lagta hai..
Ek dafa dil chhalni ho jaye to insaan khamosh ho jata hai
Jaise iss viraan aasman mein koi tuta sitara lagta hai...

Wo mohabbat-e-izhaar hone ke bawajood bhi mana kar deti hai
Dekho yaaro wo maasom sa uska aashiq kitna bechara lagta hai..
Pehli mohabbat chhod jaane ke baad
Ye jindagi apni mohabbat ke begair jeena kitna besharaa lagta hai...

Usse kehne laga mai ab se nahi karunga dillagi fareebi mehboobao se
Jo mera eklota dil hai na jaane wo kyu sirf tumhara lagta hai..

Kaise batau main tumhe, tum meri zid nahi khawish ho..
Tum to mere liye pehle mausam ki pehli baarish ho..
Itni baar pukara hai maine tumko
Khuda se maangni waale tum meri pehli sifaarish ho..

Saari zindagi maine uske naam kar di badle mein mili tanhaai
Mohabbat mein zabardasti ki nahi jaati fir bhi tum meri nakam koshish ho..
Na jaane kyu is dil ko chain nahi milta
Uss shaks se pehle iis dil ki tum meri farmaish ho...

Ye ishq to bada hi bedard nikla
Ae khuda hum dono ki milne ki koi to saazish ho..
Wo tumhe wehshi-daringdi bhari najro se dekhta hai
Jaise tum koi bazaaru husn ki numaish ho..

Kya kaha mujhse ishq karte ho..
Waah kitna acha majaak karte ho...
Humko to aata hi nahi ye khel khelna
Tum batao aaj kal kitno ka ilaaz karte ho..

Sunne mein aaya tumne usko bhi chhod diya
Mohtarma aap to bade hi kamaal karte ho..
Wo din gujar gaye jab hum tumse talluk rakhte the
Tum to barbaad-e-ishq ka karobaar karte ho..

Zindagi humari jahanum banakar chala gaye
Ab khuda se kiss baat ki duaa karte ho..
Nahi batayenge tumhare hunar ke baare mein kisi ko
Tum seedhe insaan ko qurbaan bade ache se karte ho...

Jiss shaks ko hakikat mein dekha tha wo to khawaab ban gaya..
Jo phul lagaya tha kabhi humne wo to gulaab ban gaya..
Jiss sawaal ko aksar hum taala karte the
Aaina mein khudko dekha to wahi sawal jawaab ban gaya...

Mai to karta hi nahi nashe-pate
Gilaas mein paani daala to na jaane kaise sharaab ban gaya..
Malum nahi wo logo ko kya-kya batati hogi
Meri ek galti uske tamaam gunahao ka kaise hizaab ban gaya.. (Hizaab = parda)

Logg puchte hai itna magrur kaise reh lete ho
Ab unko kya bataye jo sukoon deta tha wahi humare liye azaab ban gaya...
Sunaa hai ki tum mere liye baddua karte ho, lagta hai ye dua kubool ho gayi
Warna hum to narm mizaaj ke the ek mohabbat ke liye mai bitaab ban gaya..

Log kehne lage hai shayari karne lage ho..
Is ka matlab gamo ko barbad karne lage ho..
Inh zakhmon ko abhi bacha ke rakhna
Sunne mein aaya tum nasha karne lage ho..

Wo to tumhe ab pehchanti bhi nahi
Fir bhi tum ciggeraton se apne aap ko tabaah karne lage ho..
Majaak banate hai tera, tujhe jaanne wale sabhi
Mohabbat mein kyu tum itna pagalpan karne lage ho..

Zindagi ke safar mein akela chalna padta hai
Ye pata hone ke bawajood bhi tum in chezo se inkaar karne lage ho..
Tum hi nahi jo mohabbat mein haara ho
Tum to jete jee hi jahanum ka intezaam karne lage ho..

Mai apne jazbaat jyada likhta nahi..
Jo hunar hume aata hai aksar wahi bikta nahi..
Mai to kar hi leta dusri mohabbat
Par kya karu uske chehre ke alawa koi aur chehra dikhta nahi..

Jo hote hai humari tarah mohabbat mein pagal
Aksar wo kisi ke saamne chheekta nahi...
Ye jo baareshein hoti hai sheharon mein
Tanha insaan isme kabhi bheegta nahi..

Jo kisi ke dard ko majaak samajhta hai
Wo shaks jyada din iss zahan mein tikta nahi..
Aur jo is aziyat ko apne andar mehsus kar lete hai
Wo khaamoshi ke alawa kuch aur sikhta nahi..

Jiss shaks ko hum pasand karte hai wahi jyada teharta nahi..
Uske alawa kisi aur ke khawab dekhne ka mann karta nahi..
Suna hai tumhare dil mein naye naye log shamil hue hai
Kitna khushnaseeb ho tum tumhare siwa mai kisi aur pe marta nahi...

Kaash tum abhi bhi mere paas hote to kitna acha hota
Tumhare bagair ye din aur ye raate gujarta nahi..
Tere bina naa jaane ye dil konsa gunah kar baithe
Bahut zurm kiye hai maine khud par ab kisi cheez se darta nahi...

Wo din to gujar gaye jab hum haste-khilte the
Ab to khushi ke mahol mein bhi mai sawarta nahi...
Tumhare naye aashiqon ke liye mera ek mashwara hai
Mohabbat se pehle dastakhat kar lena isse wo mukarta nahi..

Kahaani ishq ki kyu na kuch adhuri ho jaaye..
Jinse karo mohabbat kyu na unhi se duri ho jaaye..
Nikaah ke liye kabhi puchna unse
Kya pata tumhari ye duaa puri ho jaaye..

Jo fariyaad tumhari mukkamal ho gayi
Apne parivaar ka naam lekar kya pata unki koi majboori ho jaye..
Wo kehte rahenge aap hi humari zindagi hai
Kya pata agle din wo kisi aur ke liye zaroori ho jaye..

Matt dena usko kabhi baddua
Ye cheez hi aisi hai jo kabhi bhi iski manjuri ho jaye..

Mohabbat kitaabon mein hoti hai, hakikat mein kaha...
Maja to kisi ki kaid mein hoti hai, jamanat mein kaha..
Dastaan-e-ishq likhi jaati hai do logo ke darmiyaan
Ye akelapan to dilo mein hoti hai, hukumat mein kaha..

Ab mohabbat nahi jismon ki talaash karenge hum
Sukoon toh bazaari kamro mein hoti hai, mohabbat mein kha..
Pyaar-vyaar ye sab to bass kehni ki baate hai
Izzat aankhon mein hoti hai, sharafat mein kha..

Teri aadao ka alag hi surur chhaya hai yaha
Wafayein to rago mein hoti hai, wasiyat mein kha..
Aur milenge bahut ishq ke naam par jung karne wale log
Khushiyaan to haar jaane mein hoti hai, waqalat mein kha..

Uss shaks ko dekho wo kitna hai pyaara..
Meri kismat se milo na jaane kyu hai bechara...
Hume tanha chhodkar aap na jaao aise
Apko kya malum hume to sirf aap hi ka sahaara..

Mohabbat aksar do logo ki manzori mangta hai
Hum apko chaahte hai aur apne hum hi ko nakara..
Kurbat-e-ishq chaahte ho to duri bana lo
Agar unki pasand tum nahi to mat rona uske liye dubaraa...

Kisi din agar wo apne aashiq se milne jaa rahi ho aur tum mil jao
To mat sharmana bhar dena uske rikshe ka kirayaa...
Kya pata unko kisi roz tumse ishq ho jaaye
Bass ise wahem ke saath hum apni tamaam umr hai guzaara..

Ishq mein koi nafa nahi milta.. (Nafa = profit)
Mehboobao se kabhi koi wafa nahi milta..
Jitni chaahe kar lo do tarfayein mohabbat
Ek tarfa mohabbat mein koi bewafa nahi milta...

Jo shaks tume chaahta ho use apni chahat de dena
Aise shiddat se chaahne wale har dafa nahi milta...
Kuch husn-e-daag ache bhi hote hai ae husn ko manne walo,
Idhar udhar ki baat karne walo ke mann mein koi safaa nahi milta.. (safaa = pure)

Tutte hein bikherte hein firr kabhi sawarte hai
Sachhe aashiq se puchho kahaani-e-ishq mein koi zafaa nahi milta.. (Zafaa = zulm)

Suna hai ki tum iss sehar se jaa chuki ho..
Iska matlab apne jhoote kirdaar se jaa chuki ho..
Yaad rakhna badlne se sehar mohabbat nahi badlegi humari
Khaayalo mein ho abhi, magar haa dil se jaa chuki ho.. (Magar fir bhi)

Ae khuda kar do kuch aisa ki wo mera ho jaye
Wo bhi udaas ho gaya, mano tum kisi ki dua se jaa chuki ho..
Hume thukra kar karne lage ho kisi aur se aashiqui
Yaani sunsaan kabirstan se akeli jaa chuki ho..

Hunar-e-tawaif apne rago mein basa liya hai tume
Tum to apne ehtraam se bhi jaa chuki ho..
Jo samajh nahi paaye iss jismani mohabbat ko
Tum to unhi ke tute jaazbaato se jaa chuki ho..

Chaand ki chandni mein maine teri parchaai dekhi..
Teri yaado mein maine apne dard ki gehraai dekhi..
Dilo ke khel mein dimaag ka koi kaam nahi hota
Aree yaar maine band kamre mein tere jism ki ruswaai dekhi..

Ye nahi tere baad koi mujhe mila nahi
Haazar kabro ke beech mein maine khudki tanhaai dekhi..
Ishq mein kon kehta hai ki hamesha mukkamal hoti hai
Maine to khuda ki mohabbat ki bhi judaai dekhi..

Agar kisi ki yaado mein qaid hai dil tumhara..
Iska matlab wada-e-ishq nibha raha hai dil tumhara..
Raah chalte hoti nahi kisi se bhi mohabbat
Agar ho jaye to bada hi naadan hai dil tumhara..

Aur to kayi madhumakkhi baith jaate phulo par begair izazat ke
Dhyaan rakhna apna kahi kho na jaaye isme dil tumhara..
Bahut si gazale abhi mohabbat par likhni hai "Rohan"
Kahi na kahi to pighal hi jayega dil tumhara..

Kabhi chaand kabhi phool naa jaane kya kya tumne usko maan liya
Barbaadi ke kinaare pohoch chuka hai ye dil tumhara..
Tumhare aankhon ka raaj chupta kaha hai
Zubaan bhale hi khaamosh rahe cheekh padta hai dil tumhara.

Kisi se mohabbat karte ho to apni sare umr uske naam kar dena..
Jaate jaate usse apni mohabbat ka izhaar bhi kar dena..
Kuch nahi milta mohabbat mein zillat ke siwaay
Apni maut tak uss shaks ka naam apne seene mein dafan kar dena..

Jab bhi uska chehra nazar aa jaye tumhe
Apne haath filaakar khuda ke samne uski ki duaa kar dena..
Puri raat uski yaadon mein maine khud ko paaya hai
Ae khuda tu to mera bhi hai usko mere hisse mein kar dena..

Mere jaanne wale meri mohabbat ko majaak samajhte hai
Ae takdeer likhne waale unka ye bharam bhi dur kar dena..
Ye jo shayar apne dukh dard likhte hai apni shayari mein
Waah-waah kar ke uski takleefe kamm kar denaaa...

Mujhko mohabbat hai tumse, tum samjho to sahi..
Mere khwaabon ka wo shaks ho tum, tum samjho to sahi..
Na din na raat mujhko chain deta hai,
Bass tere hone ka ehsaas hota hai, tum samjho toh sahi...

Kuch kahaniyaan yaad aati hai mujhko "Rohan"
Tumhara gairo se milna dil dukhata hai mera, tum samjho toh sahi..
Ye baarish ka mausam itna khaas kyu hai
Aashiq iske sahaare khulkar ro lete hai, tum samjho to sahi..

Kinaare kar rahe ho tum apni purani yaado ko
Naye aashiq se bhi tumko gila hoga, time samjho to sahi..

Uske jhoote ishq par mai tohmat kaise kar sakta hu..
Kisi shaks ki rabb ke samne mai ibadat kaise kar sakta hu..
Uss gali-mohalle mein mera jaana mana hai
Uski duaa mai begair izazat kaise kar sakta hu..

Mana ki mohabbat mein kisi hukam ki zarurat nahi hoti
Jo bhula gaya ho hume mai uski chahat kaise kar sakta hu..
Dost kehte hai kisi ko bhulne ke liye kisi ko apnana padta hai "Rohan"
Bhala uss insaan ki jagah mai kisi aur se ulfat kaise kar sakta hu..

Suna hai ki tum kisi aur se nikaah ke liye maan gayi ho
Ae khuda ab mai uski yaado se khudki zamanat kaise kar sakta hu..

Mai kisi ka ho na sakaa, sirf tere liye..
Khudke saare armaan tode, sirf tere liye..
Aaj bhi tujhse mohabbat karta hai ye "Rohan"
Mashukaao ko dekhna chhod diya, sirf tere liye..

Jiss din tune khwaab dekha kisi aur naam ke
Tab se inn haatho ne jaam ka gilaas tham liya, sirf tere liye..
Innh aankhon ko aadat lag gayi jabse tumhari nazro ki
Humne nazre jhukaana seekh liya, sirf tere liye..

Har bar apna dard sunate hi tera khayal aa jata hai
Humne tabse mehfil mein jaana hi band kar diya, sirf tere liye..
Kuch tasveere tumhari ab bhi mere paas hai
Unko dekhkar har kisi ko thukraya hai maine, sirf tere liye...

Wo puchte hai aap kya kaam karte hai..
Humne kaha ji apka ehteraam karte hai..
Oo accha to aap shayaar hai..
Ji nahi bass ishq se haare hue kaayar hai..

Lagta hai apka dil kisi aur pe marta hai..
Nahi nahi ye dil to bass dhoke se darta hai..
Aap logo se kyu itna kamm milte hai..
Rishte jyada banao to aksar gamm milte hai..

Ye samajh le aap zindagi mein akela raha nahi jaata..
Ab kya hi bataye aapko ab ye mohabbat ka dard saha nahi jaata..
Kya aapko nasha karna acha lagta hai..
Ji hai hume pasand hai jab jaam se jaam takrata hai..

Ek dua masjido-mandiro mein mangni hai maine..
Jii haan tujhko khuda se mangni hai maine..
Wo ek lamha jo meri jindagi ka sabse khaas pal tha,
Haa wo 11 February ki raat mangni hai maine..

Dhere-dhere tera rang-roop bhulta jaa raha hai "Rohan",
Koi jinn aa jaye mere paas tera chehra mangni hai maine..
